name: Rundll32 From Abnormal Drive
description: Detects rundll32.exe executing from an abnormal drive such as a mounted ISO.
false_positives: Rare false positives could occur on servers with multiple drives.
note: **Detection Rule without Regex for better understanding. Be careful, this way is case sensitive:**`(process.executable:*\\rundll32.exe AND (NOT ((process.working_directory:*C\:\\* OR process.working_directory:"") OR (NOT _exists_:process.working_directory))))`
